input.sentences: sometimes drinking can lead to silly things . while some could be funny | others could be really scary .
some people manage to even lose their clothes and do n't remember the next day .
there has even been a few people that go and get a crazy haircut .
but it is better to have a goodnight sleep even if it is in a hotel .
but in any condition it is never safe to drive after having drinks .
output.sentences: After drinking too much wine, Sara decided to go for a walk.
She grabbed her sweatpants and headed out into the night.
She was there was room at the seedy motel downtown.
Soon she realized she was miles from home and wished she had a car.
